p: In addition, it is important to define the best way to investigate P. aduncum EO or dillapiole in open field studies or infested areas, in order to develop new phytoiatric formulations, such as nanoemulsions or insecticidal sugar baits, which can be successfully adopted as alternative commercial biopesticides. With the same approach, deeper pharmacological investigations that include formulation development should be performed in order to obtain new plant-based antiparasitic drugs.
